text.title: Q: Cannot access the network or disconnect after connecting to SSH
text.desc: A: Please ignore the battery optimization and lock the background, turn off the power consumption optimization and other functions.

text.title: Q: After installing the desktop environment, I only have X and a gray background when connecting to VNC?
Q: The container failed to start?
text.desc: A:Submit the error screenshot to Github Issue.

text.title: Off-topic: How to use external Rootfs?
text.desc: A: AnLinux or termux and other rootfs can be used in dogeland. installation steps: 1. Import the tar.xz or tar.gz package 2. Use the run terminal command, use the package manager (apt, pacman, apk...) to install dropbear (what specific Baidu 3. After installation, set up-quick start settings-select dropbear, and then install the GNU/LINUX extension components in the store 4. Start the container and connect using ssh
